name: stringfunctions
description:
This module exports two functions for splitting strings into arrays of strings with a specified maximum length. The `splitParagraph` function splits a given paragraph into an array of strings, each with a maximum length of the specified maximum length. The `splitString` function splits a given string into an array of strings, each with a maximum length of the specified maximum length, and each separated by at least two newlines or two `
` sequences.
author: Litruv
